name: Astra Superstars
details: Sega Saturn RAM cart compatible but not required - better loading times (1MB is slight improvement and 4MB is bigger improvement)

name: Cotton 2: Magical Night Dreams
details: Sega Saturn RAM cart compatible but not required - extra voices and speech (no difference)

name: Cyberbots: Fullmetal Madness
details: Sega Saturn RAM cart compatible but not required - adds a few frames of animation per character and loading times slightly improved (no difference)

name: Dungeons & Dragons: Shadow over Mystara
details: Sega Saturn 4MB RAM cart required

name: Fighter's History Dynamite
details: Sega Saturn RAM cart required - either size works (no difference)

name: Final Fight Revenge
details: Sega Saturn 4MB RAM cart required

name: Friends: Seishun no Kagayaki
details: Sega Saturn RAM cart compatible but not required - unknown what it does but case says it is compatible

name: Groove on Fight
details: Sega Saturn RAM cart required - used to store animations since it is a tag team fighter which means 4 characters get loaded at once (either size works - no difference)

name: The King of Fighters '95
details: Sega Saturn game specific ROM cart required that came with game - backgrounds stored on ROM cart

name: The King of Fighters '96
details: Sega Saturn 1MB RAM cart required - 4MB cart will work but creates graphical glitches (3rd party carts usually don't do 1MB properly so they don't work)

name: The King of Fighters '97
details: Sega Saturn RAM cart required - either size is fine (no difference)

name: Marvel Super Heroes
details: Sega Saturn RAM cart compatible but not required - either size works for significant improvement of animations (no difference)

name: Marvel Super Heroes vs. Street Fighter
details: Sega Saturn 4MB RAM cart required

name: Metal Slug: Super Vehicle-001
details: Sega Saturn RAM cart required - allows for playing entire level without extra loading unlike PlayStation version (either size works - no difference)

name: NOel 3: Mission on the Line
details: Sega Saturn RAM cart compatible but not required - not sure what it does

name: Pia Carrot he Youkoso!! 2
details: Sega Saturn RAM car compatible but not required - not sure what they add but supposed to get differences when using 1MB vs 4MB (either size works - no difference)

name: Pocket Fighter
details: Sega Saturn RAM cart compatible but not required - more frames of animation (either size works - no difference)

name: Real Bout Fatal Fury
details: Sega Saturn RAM cart required - either cart works but the 1MB cart introduces bugs and the 4MB cart has graphical glitches on Saturn model 1 (model 2 Saturn doesn't seem to have these issues)

name: Real Bout Fatal Fury Special
details: Sega Saturn RAM cart required (either size works - no difference)

name: Samurai Shodown III
details: Sega Saturn RAM cart required (either size works - no difference)

name: Samurai Shodown IV: Amakusa's Revenge
details: Sega Saturn RAM cart required (either size works but 4MB cart introduces graphical glitches)

name: Street Fighter Alpha 3
details: Sega Saturn 4MB RAM cart required - much better loading times and more animation frames than other platforms

name: Super Real Mahjong P7
details: Sega Saturn RAM cart compatible but not required - no loading screen without RAM cart but difference loading screens depending on which size RAM cart used

name: UltraMan: Hikari no Kyojin Densetsu
details: Sega Saturn game specific ROM cart required that came with game - used to store 2MB of sprite data

name: Vampire Savior: The Lord of Vampire
details: Sega Saturn 4MB RAM cart required - used for animations and load time improvements

name: Waku Waku 7
details: Sega Saturn RAM cart required (either size works - no difference)

name: X-Men vs. Street Fighter
details: Sega Saturn 4MB RAM cart required
